line.originaltext: 1 1/2 cups dried black-eyed peas, soaked overnight
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "1 1/2 cups dried black-eyed peas, soaked overnight")

line.originaltext: 1/3 cup chopped celery, with leaves
line.annotation: create_ing(ing1, "1/3 cup chopped celery, with leaves")

line.originaltext: 1 1/2 cups shredded carrot
3/4 cup chopped fresh parsley
1/2 cup chopped white onion
1/8 cup chopped fresh mint
1/4 cup olive oil
2 oranges, juiced
1/2 lemon, juiced
1 garlic clove, pressed
1/2 teaspoon ground coriander
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
line.annotation: create_ing(ing12, "1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper")

line.originaltext: 1 teaspoon brown sugar
Place the beans in a saucepan with enough water to cover them by one inch.
Place the beans in a saucepan with enough water to cover them by one inch.
Place the beans in a saucepan with enough water to cover them by one inch.
Bring beans to a slow boil.
Reduce heat to low, and simmer until tender but not mushy (about 35 minutes).
Reduce heat to low, and simmer until tender but not mushy (about 35 minutes).
Set aside to cool.
When the beans have cooled, place them in a large bowl.
When the beans have cooled, place them in a large bowl.
Add the celery, carrots, parsley, white onion, and mint; toss to blend.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing15, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5}, ing16, "salad", "add")

line.originaltext: Add the celery, carrots, parsley, white onion, and mint; toss to blend.
For dressing, blend olive oil, orange and lemon juice, garlic, coriander, salt, pepper, and brown sugar in a blender for 6 seconds.
For dressing, blend olive oil, orange and lemon juice, garlic, coriander, salt, pepper, and brown sugar in a blender for 6 seconds.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11, ing12, ing13, ing6, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing18, "dressing", "in blender")

line.originaltext: For dressing, blend olive oil, orange and lemon juice, garlic, coriander, salt, pepper, and brown sugar in a blender for 6 seconds.
Transfer to a small saucepan, and simmer over low heat for five minutes.
Transfer to a small saucepan, and simmer over low heat for five minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing19, t3, ing20, "cooked dressing", "simmer over low heat for five minutes")

line.originaltext: Remove from heat, and cool.
Pour dressing over the bean salad, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.
Pour dressing over the bean salad, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.
